Sentencas: This study presents the co-sintering of anode-supported GDC/NiO-GDC Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) prepared by the Cold Sintering Process (CSP).
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A layer (<100 mu m) of GDC electrolyte powders was first spread on a circular piece of filter paper cut at the die punch diameter size, then put on a relatively thick, porous NiO-GDC anode powder before CSP.
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The bi-layer was first cold-sintered at room temperature (RT), a very rare case in the literature, and then post-sintered at 1100 degrees C, which was much lower than the ones reported in the literature by using conventional furnaces.
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In the end, GDC electrolyte densities were found to be between 95 and 97% of their theoretical value while the NiO-GDC anode was sintered to gain mechanical strength but remained porous as desired.
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: SOFCs constructed from these cold-sintered GDC/NiO-GDC bilayers exhibited an open circuit potential of 0.85 V at 750 degrees C, confirming dense and gas-tight GDC electrolytes.
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A promising polarization resistance of 0.15 Omega.cm(2) was obtained from the cold-sintered Ni-GDC anode at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of cold sintering on the sintering shrinkage matching of NiO-GDC anode with GDC electrolytes in making anode-supported solid oxide fuel cells
